programme.title: Bas Stop! Ep12

programme.title: Punchline DAC S2 Ep39

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong Kuasa 2 Ep03

programme.title: Travel Lawak Ep08

programme.title: Motif Sosial? Ep11

programme.title: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline Ep11

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak Series Ep12

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: After a kung-fu master (Lau Kar Leung) is crippled by a ruthless villain, he teaches a boy monkey kung-fu to avenge his shame.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: This three-film anthology collectively offers up a captivating examination of human obsession and love.

programme.title: Brothers From the Walled City
programme.desc: The lives of two very different brothers intertwine when they find themselves the target of a vengeful inspector.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: This gender-bending tale depicts the romance between a wealthy girl and a man disguised as a flunkey in order to be employed at her house.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Director Lu Chun-ku leads Liu Yung, Liang Yun-hsin and 'Thundering Mantis,' Liang Chia-jen on a madcap quest filled with double crosses and triple plots.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Share the adventures of patriot Chu Tieh-hsieh and his three comrades, who head out with the aim of 'relieving' Mongolian invaders of their ill-gotten gains.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Sun Chung teams up with real-life kungfu champion Chen Kuan-tai and martial arts choreographer Liu Chia-yung to tell the tale of a bandit with a conscience.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: 60s pop star Carrie Ku Mei plays pop star 'Little Lark' in her greatest role, in this romance that features some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Directed by Chang Cheh and starring Ti Lung in his first main role, this drama depicts how two lovers contend with family opposition and an unjust accusation.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: The peace-loving prince of the Dali nation turns out to be the target for vengeance because of an old romantic feud.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Two women and a man have to deal with forgery, fire and poisoned needles when they go up against a notorious gang.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: The peaceful life of Golden Swallow is shattered when her unrequited suitor, Silver Roc, begins a killing spree to draw her out of seclusion. Stars Cheng Pei Pei, Jimmy Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: According to this sex comedy, the true power behind China's many warlords were the prostitutes that these men would visit.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: A young man and his sifu earn a living as pseudo-ghost catchers until his sifu is arrested and an honest gal becomes his new companion.

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: As Wong Hei, a slick assassin, zeroes in on a millionaire named Shek, little does he expect to find himself the target of someone even more dangerous.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: When the Emperor employs Manchu boxers to eradicate the Shao Lin martial artists, see how two escapees begin a quest to restore the reputation of Shao Lin.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: King Hu's groundbreaking film set the foundation for all his action films that followed, most notably Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Various people are out to get the Shadow Whip (an individual, not just a weapon). Starring Cheng Pei Pei and Yueh Hua.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chang Cheh presents this ultimate depiction of dysfunctional kung fu masters, overcoming their shortcomings to win the day, one corpse at a time.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: If you liked House of 72 Tenants, you won't want to miss out on this humorous, fun-filled sequel complete with 10 more tenants!

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A trio of heroes go up against a power-hungry Ming Dynasty official and also cross paths with three beauties.

programme.title: Mr. Funny Bone
programme.desc: Whenever Mr. Funny Bone travels about with his sidekick Big Potato, he often gets involved in all manner of charming comic mishaps.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: Shu Pei-pei shines in this production alongside hero Yueh Hua, her stalwart companion, in a battle to rid their town of killers and thieves.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: A follow-up to the previous blockbuster, this 60's musical features an unemployed magician whose love life is as twisted as his tricks.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: The retired one-armed swordsman made his reappearance to fight against the brutal robbers and protect the peace of the martial art world.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A motorcycle workshop owner feels compelled to damn the physical and legal consequences and go on racing.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: In this award-winning classic, a beauty disguises herself as a boy to attend school yet tend to her lover. Stars Lo Ti, Ling Po.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists fighting against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they lived.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: To escape a love affair gone bad, Yanny heads to San Jose to visit an old friend, Ling, and her husband. But what seems an ideal, carefree existence hides some unspeakable secrets.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story about a talented blind pianist who meets a talented amateur dancer, this drama captures a journey to their dreams.

programme.title: Sky on Fire
programme.desc: Directed by Ringo Lam, Daniel Wu stars as a security chief embroiled in a battle to protect a cure for deadly disease from falling into the wrong hands. Joseph Chang & Zhang Ruo Yun co-star.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: A young emperor & his cross-dressing sister, and a restaurant-owning wanderer & his sibling descends into a swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics & romance.

programme.title: I Love That Crazy Little Thing
programme.desc: Setting in motion a crazy adventure, William Chan stars as a film editor whose life plunges into a downward trend. Film also stars Nicholas Tse, Gillian Chung & Korean actor Seo In Guk.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: The murder of a high profile Japanese businessman results in a 100 million bounty on the killer's head. Yet, when one of his own begins a hunt, the outcome proves surprising.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: Fleeing a civil war, the pregnant queen of a monsters' realm takes refuge in the human world. Helped by a villager, she begins a quest to protect her son whom evil forces seek to possess.

programme.title: Throw down
programme.desc: Johnnie To pays homage to his idol Akira Kurosawa in this all-star story of a former Judo champion who receives a second chance.

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: Leon Lai's directorial debut stars Zhang Han Yu in a story that revolves around an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and a historical mystery.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: David Ki was a top rock climber in Asia - until an accident left him wheelchair bound. With unyielding courage and tenacity, David is back to scaling dizzy heights and conquering Lion Rock!

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men lead a reckless life - but when people start turning into zombies across the city, they take on the responsibility of braving the infected district to save others.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Eternal rivals Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are in a race to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the superstar midwife Gong San to "supervise" their sons and nephews to make it happen.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: The murder of a high profile Japanese businessman results in a 100 million bounty on the killer's head. Yet, when one of his own begins a hunt, the outcome proves surprising.

programme.title: So, I Married My Anti-fan
programme.desc: Starring Korean boy band EXO member Chanyeol & Chinese actress Yuan Shan Shan, this drama depicts how an anti-fan falls for the idol she initially hated.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five university students find themselves braving the supernatural & a murky past at a school once used by the Japanese to conduct macabre human experiments.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: The final chapter of Wong Jing's Colour Trilogy. Jordan Chan and Simon Yam bring you into the criminal underworld of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: In this 39th Hong Kong Film Award winner, a newly-engaged woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander. Will she be able to free herself from her past?

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Superstar Andy Lau stars as a bomb specialist set on capturing a wanted criminal called Blast in this action-drama. However, will he be able to do it in time when Blast threatens a massacre?

programme.title: The Secret Diary of a Mom-To-Be
programme.desc: Carmen, who works at a PR company, has no intention of having children and is enjoying married life. Yet, what happens when she suddenly finds herself pregnant?

programme.title: Hungry Ghost Ritual
programme.desc: In this dark tale, Nick Cheung plays the son of an opera troupe owner, who finds his cast behaving strangely and the most terrifying show ever about to begin.

programme.title: Kajillionaire
programme.desc: During a hastily conceived heist, a family of con-artists charm a stranger into joining their next scam, only to have their entire world turned upside down.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: After a plane crash a young therapist Claire is assigned by her mentor to counsel the flight's five survivors. Claire is intrigued by Eric the most secretive of the passengers.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: BIRDMAN tells the story of an actor famous for portraying an iconic superhero as he struggles to mount a Broadway play.

programme.title: Once
programme.desc: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin as they write rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

programme.title: The Way I See it
programme.desc: A rare glimpse inside the American presidency through the unique lens of former Chief Official White House Photographer, Pete Souza.

programme.title: Wish Upon a Unicorn
programme.desc: Two sisters set off on a wild adventure to save their new unicorn friend Rocco from the town's cowboy, who wants to use Rocco's magical powers for himself.

programme.title: Like Crazy
programme.desc: A British college student falls for an American student but finds out that they have to be separated.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The quest for perfection drives two magicians to the very edge of sanity and morality.

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: When the estranged daughter of a late famed photographer discovers a photograph tucked away in a safe-deposit box, she finds herself on a journey delving into her mother's early life.

programme.title: Superman: Man of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Follow the fledgling hero as he engages in bloody battles with intergalactic bounty hunter Lobo and before fighting for his life with the alien Parasite.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep932
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: I Am Sam
programme.desc: The moving story of unconditional love that grows between a mentally challenged man, his daughter and the attorney who accepts his case pro bono.

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: An elite U.S. Special Forces unit, sent into the Bolivian jungle on a search and destroy mission, is betrayed and left for dead.

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, 'All My Life' follows a young couple (Jessica Rothe and Harry Shum Jr.) who are planning their wedding even after the groom's devastating cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: This supernatural thriller follows another real case from the files of renowned demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: On a first date, a black man and woman are stopped by a policeman over a minor traffic infraction. As the situation spirals, the man kills the officer in self-defense, forcing the two to go on the run.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: A veteran investigating the bizarre murder of a fellow officer discovers a mysterious figure in the body cam footage. She suspects something supernatural is targeting the cops in her unit.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: High school students conspire to steal the answers to the SAT but realize that true happiness does not stem from a perfect score.

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, 'All My Life' follows a young couple (Jessica Rothe and Harry Shum Jr.) who are planning their wedding even after the groom's devastating cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Pan

programme.desc: Wonder Woman fights to free a troubled young girl enlisted by the deadly organization Villainy Inc., whose criminal members have their sights set on invading Themyscira; Wonder Woman's paradise home.

programme.desc: A man enlists the help of a woman and her kids to land the woman of his dreams.

programme.desc: When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep412
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, it's up to Blaze to get it back!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 Ep508
programme.desc: Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into Adventure Bay's cliffs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the PAW Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta need help! // Farmer Al needs help saving his corn crop after the top of his silo is knocked off!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Calvin wants to make a GIANT surprise cake for Kaison. But when his Bigger / Smaller Baking Machine malfunctions, he has to summon his PLAY POWER to prevent a total cake-tastrophe!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep110
programme.desc: With HQ in a heatwave, it's too hot for CALVIN to play with his new cars. Luckily, it's icy cool in the Kid Cave but it turns his cars into ice balls! He must use his PLAY POWER to find a new way to play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse, with a password too!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy must find her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Peppa's playgroup holds a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof. Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. They all bring an old toy but soon realise that it is hard to let them go.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the pool, so is Rebecca Rabbit. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to find that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can't see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep504
programme.desc: When Mr. Grumpfish turns up in Happy Junction, he makes everyone in town really grumpy! Will Sheriff Molly find a way to help everyone handle their tricky emotions?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party. There's even a pinata!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep217
programme.desc: It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep520
programme.desc: In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the World's Biggest Trophy!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep107
programme.desc: After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Toms's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep324
programme.desc: Buddy - Mayor Goodway's gesture of goodwill gift grows out of control when it's planted wrongly. Time for a transplant! // Metal mayhem ensues when Marshall's Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington says he will watch the cafe so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep136
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep139
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep142
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends but it's not yet finished. We play Blue's Clues to find out who else Blue wants to add to her painting and skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep721
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! / Mayor Goodway's purse chicken 'Chickaletta' is missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search for her.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep108
programme.desc: After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep409
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of 'grow spice' onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep410
programme.desc: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep117
programme.desc: After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep406

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep406
programme.desc: When their friend Skip's moving day doesn't go as planned, Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppy Movers roll in to set things right in Skip's new home!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep511
programme.desc: When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that they will be hungry, so Granny Pig helps.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Peppa and friends make a time capsule. They each put a favourite thing inside and bury it in the school garden. They discover that their parents made a time capsule years ago and now it's time to open it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a green box to be recycled. Old newspapers and tins go into other boxes. They have fun filling them!

programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed.

programme.desc: Calvin's remote control car has been turbo charged and is out of control! Can Calvin summon his PLAY POWER before the kid cave is totally destroyed?

programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: The story of the bizarre King Hwanghae and a look-a-like peasant, who stands in for the monarch when the King faces the threat of assassination.

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: The marital bliss of Seok-jung and Eun-ha was threatened as Eun-ha was tested positive for HIV and met her abusive ex-husband again...

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the strange case.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Modern Boy
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese rule, a Korean civil servant with an extravagant lifestyle falls in love with a bar singer who turns out to be a member of the Korean independence movement.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Queen of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: The King'S Case Note
programme.desc: A clever King and his brilliant chronicle keeper hunt for the truth behind a crime that threatens the throne and the stability of the country.

programme.title: Hwayi: a Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman's three grown children one after the other - Eldest son Han-mo, second son In-mo, and double divorce daughter Mi-yun.

programme.title: Fists of Legend
programme.desc: Based on webcomic 'Legendary Fist', three old friends and rivals get set to face off on a TV program billed as 'The Greatest Fight Show on Earth' and battle it out for the big prize.

programme.title: Detective K: Secret of Virtuous Widow
programme.desc: Joseon's top detective investigates a series of mysterious murders plaguing the country, uncovering disturbing secrets that link the murders to a massive conspiracy that will shake the whole nation.

programme.title: Innocent Thing
programme.desc: A high school student develops a crush on her popular gym teacher that soon spirals out of control when she becomes dangerously obsessed.

programme.title: Dark Figure of Crime
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, it tells a fierce psychological confrontation between a police detective and a killer who confessed to multiple murders.

programme.title: The Classic
programme.desc: Ji-hae writes a love letter for her friend to a boy they both have a crush on. As the boy falls in love with her letters, she discovers that her mother also had a similar romance in the past.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Too Hot to Die
programme.desc: Three men who've made a pact to commit suicide plan their last night out but things change when a beautiful woman appears in front of them.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Parallel Life

programme.title: Blood and Ties
